data.name: Marvel Heroes 2015 - Spider-Man Hero Pack
data.detailed_description:
When bitten by a radioactive spider, Peter Parker gained all the powers of the arachnid. After his Uncle Ben was killed by a thief that Peter himself had allowed to escape, he realized that with great power comes great responsibility. Since that day, Spider-Man has fought criminals while enduring personal hardships.

Items Included in this Pack:

  • Spider-Man
  • 3 Costumes (Spider-Man Modern, Sensational Spider-Man, Spider-Man Classic)
  • Spider-Man Hero S.T.A.S.H. (extra Hero specific inventory, costumes will appear here)

Minimum:

  • Processor: Core 2 DUO 2.1 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.1 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX10 Compatible ATI Radeon 3870 / NVIDIA 8800 GT / Intel HD 3000 Integrated Graphics with 512 MB VRAM or higher
